column4: Daily is the frequency by which parents are notified of the student's progress on annual goals.
Monthly is the frequency by which parents are notified of the student's progress on annual goals.
Other is specified as the frequency by which parents are notified of the student's progress on annual goals.
Quarterly is the frequency by which parents are notified of the student's progress on annual goals.
Term is the frequency by which parents are notified of the student's progress on annual goals.
Weekly is the frequency by which parents are notified of the student's progress on annual goals.
